content: Hello Mister Heine, thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller

content: Hello, thank you for considering me as a potential tenant. I understand that you are looking for someone reliable and responsible to rent your apartment. May I ask what the rental price is for the 25 square meter apartment?
name: Max Müller

content: The rental price is 300 Euros per month. This is the minimum price that I am willing to accept. Would you be interested in this?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Thank you for sharing the rental price. I understand that you are looking for a responsible and dependable tenant, and I assure you that I am both. I am willing to accept the rental price of 300 Euros per month. May we proceed with the negotiation process?
name: Max Müller

content:
All right, I may have a few questions for you. What kind of work do you do? Do you have any references that I can contact?

Also, I am interested in learning more about your living habits. For example, do you have any pets that I should be aware of? This will help me better understand your needs and how I can help you maintain a clean and respectful living space.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am currently a student, and I am looking for a place to live in while I complete my studies. As for my work, I have a part-time job at a local store, which allows me to support myself and pay my rent on time.

Regarding references, I can provide you with contact information for my previous landlords, who can speak to my character and reliability.

As for my living habits, I am a clean and respectful person, and I do not have any pets. I am careful about keeping the apartment clean and tidy, and I appreciate it when my living space is respected in return.
name: Max Müller
